text: Froebel's International School is a private school in Pakistan. It was founded in 1975 by Mrs. Sabiha Zamir Khan. The school network has expanded to 8 campuses in 5 cities with faculty strength of nearly 400. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Educational institutions established in 1975 Category:Schools in Lahore Category:Schools in Islamabad Category:Schools in Rawalpindi Category:Academic institutions in Pakistan Category:Private schools in Pakistan Category:1975 establishments in Pakistan
title: Froebel's International School
